Finding Features¶

Example¶

# features_dict is the dictionary obtained after reading nominal and/or ordinal data

from EBDM import feature_functions

feat_std_entropy = std_entropy(features_dict)
feat_entropy = feature_entropy(feat_std_entropy)
feat_rel = reliability(feat_entropy)
total_rel = total_reliability(feat_rel)
features_dict_weighted = weights(feat_rel, total_rel)

for f in features_dict.keys():
    print('name:',f)
    print('type:',features_dict[f].feat_type)
    print('num_cat:',features_dict[f].num_cat)
    print()
    for cat in features_dict[f].categories.keys():
        print('    index:',features_dict[f].categories[cat].index)
        print('    name:',features_dict[f].categories[cat].name)
        print()
    print()

Output will be

name: You often feel that your life is aimless, with no definite purpose
type: ordinal
num_cat: 5
entropy: 1.4702489763160878
std_entropy: 1.6094379124341003
reliability: 0.9135170514856927

    index: 0
    name: Strong Disagree
    prob: 0.13008130081300814
    entropy: 0.26531325309042425

    index: 1
    name: Disagree
    prob: 0.3902439024390244
    entropy: 0.3672130124739616

    index: 2
    name: Neither
    prob: 0.21951219512195122
    entropy: 0.33285676595884867

    index: 3
    name: Agree
    prob: 0.18699186991869918
    entropy: 0.3135274244487411

    index: 4
    name: Strong Agree
    prob: 0.07317073170731707
    entropy: 0.19133852034411206

Features Class¶

class features.Features(name, feat_type)¶

A class used to represent a feature. A feature represents question asked in the questionnaire. … .. attribute:: name

the name of the feature

type

str

feat_type¶

the type of feature: ordinal or nominal

Type

str

num_cat¶

the number of categories for a feature in the questionnaire

Type

int

categories¶

a dictionary with keys as category name and values as objects of Categories class

Type

dictionary

entropy¶

the entropy of a feature in a particular population, given by entropy of feature = sum(entropy of categories)

Type

float

std_entropy¶

the standard entropy of a feature given by log(num_cat)

Type

float

reliability¶

the reliability of a feature given by entropy/ std_entropy

Type

float

weight¶

the weight of a feature given by reliability/ total_reliability

Type

float

distance¶

the dictionary of distances between categories of a feature. distance[cat1][cat2] represents distance between cat1 and cat2

Type

dictionary

category_order¶

the dictionary from category index to category name

Type

dictionary

Calculating Occurence Probability¶

feature_functions.probability(df, features)¶

Calculates the occurence probability of all the categories for every feature.

Parameters

  • df (panda dataframe) – the dataset of the population

  • features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated probability values.

Return type

dictionary

Calculating Entropies¶

feature_functions.entropy(features)¶

Calculates the entropy of all the categories for every feature.

Parameters

features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated entropy values.

Return type

dictionary

feature_functions.std_entropy(features)¶

Calculates the standard entropy of all the features.

Parameters

features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated standard entropy values.

Return type

dictionary

feature_functions.feature_entropy(features)¶

Calculates the entropy of all the features.

Parameters

features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated feature entropy values.

Return type

dictionary

Calculating Reliability¶

feature_functions.reliability(features)¶

Calculates the reliability of all the features.

Parameters

features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated reliability values.

Return type

dictionary

feature_functions.total_reliability(features)¶

Calculates the total reliability of the features.

Parameters

features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

Returns

total_rel – the total reliability of the features

Return type

float

Calculating Weights¶

feature_functions.weights(features, total_reliability)¶

Calculates the weights of all the features.

Parameters

  • features (dictionary) – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class.

  • total_reliability (float) – the total reliability of the features

Returns

features – a dictionary of features with keys as feature name and values as objects of feature class with updated weight values.

Return type

dictionary
